traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: Can hold its breath for 30 minutes out of water.

traits.name: Underwater Camouflage
traits.description: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

traits.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.description: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a Bonus Action.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.description: *Melee:* +4, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 1 Bludgeoning, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 10). Until the grapple ends, the octopus can't use Tentacles on another target.
